title: Build 'My Goals : 2026' Goal Tracker dashboard with 7 color-coded cards

requirements.text: Create a dashboard page titled "My Goals : 2026" that visually matches the provided reference image, featuring a single horizontal row of exactly 7 vertical goal cards in this order and color scheme: (1) "Career-Professional" (Yellow), (2) "Personal Development" (Orange), (3) "Laboral-Job" (Red/Salmon), (4) "Family and Sentimental" (Pink), (5) "Financial" (Purple), (6) "Health" (Blue), (7) "Academic-University" (Light Green).

quotes:
Create a dynamic and interactive Goal Tracker dashboard called 'My Goals : 2026' like in the picture

Layout: Display 7 vertical cards in a single horizontal row. The cards should be: Career-Professional (Yellow), Personal Development (Orange), Laboral-Job (Red/Salmon), Family and Sentimental (Pink), Financial (Purple), Health (Blue), and Academic-University (Light Green).

acceptanceCriteria: The page shows the title text "My Goals : 2026".
Seven cards render in a single left-to-right row in the specified order.
Each card has a distinct header/background color that clearly matches the requested color family (yellow/orange/red-salmon/pink/purple/blue/light green).
Overall layout is visually aligned with the uploaded reference image (card proportions, spacing, header style, and list-like goals presentation).

requirements.text: Apply the Lora font in italic style to all card titles and all goal text across the dashboard.

quotes: Use the Lora font in Italic for all titles and goal text.

acceptanceCriteria: Lora is loaded in the frontend and used for the dashboard typography.
All card titles are rendered using Lora italic.
All goal item text is rendered using Lora italic.

requirements.text: Inside each card, render a list of goals with a dashed separator line between goal items.

quotes: Each card should have a dashed separator line between goals.

acceptanceCriteria: Each card displays multiple goal items in a vertical list.
A dashed divider is visible between consecutive goal items (not just between header and first item).

requirements.text: Implement interactive goal items so each goal can be marked complete/incomplete via a checkbox-style control, updating the UI state immediately.

quotes: Create a dynamic and interactive Goal Tracker dashboard

acceptanceCriteria: Each goal item has a clickable checkbox control.
Toggling a checkbox updates only that goalâ€™s completed state in the UI without a full page refresh.
Completed vs incomplete goals are visually distinguishable (e.g., checkbox state and/or subtle text styling), while keeping the overall look consistent with the reference image.

requirements.text: Enforce the row behavior: all cards must stay on one row (no wrapping). Horizontal scrolling must be disabled when there are 7 or fewer cards, and enabled only when there are more than 7 cards.

quotes: Behavior: All cards must stay in one row. no horizontal scrolling only If there are more than 7 cards.

acceptanceCriteria: With exactly 7 cards, cards do not wrap and there is no horizontal scrollbar.
If the card count is increased beyond 7 (e.g., by adding an 8th card in data), horizontal overflow becomes scrollable so the additional card(s) can be reached.
The layout remains a single-row layout in both cases (no wrapping).

requirements.text: Add a button labeled "See goals per month" at the end (right side) of the card row.

quotes: At the end , add a button "See goals per month"

acceptanceCriteria: A button with exact text "See goals per month" appears after the last card in the row.
The button is reachable/visible in the row layout (and via horizontal scroll if card overflow is enabled).

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose them instead).
Do not modify any frontend files listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Backend persistence of goals and checkbox states (no requirement to store data in Motoko canister unless explicitly requested later).
